question: Which organisation successfully demonstrated the Solid Fuel Ducted Ramjet (SFDR) technology?
explanation:
The Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) successfully carried out a flight demonstration based on Solid Fuel Ducted Ramjet (SFDR) technology.
It was carried out from the Integrated Test Range (ITR) Chandipur off the coast of Odisha. The technology, which is available in select countries, will help in developing long range air-to-air missiles.
